verses.text: Listen, Shepherd \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Israel, who leads Joseph like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock \w of|strong="H4210"\w* sheep; from your throne \w on|strong="H5329"\w* \w the|strong="H5329"\w* cherubs shine forth

\w before|strong="H3427"\w* Ephraim, Manasseh, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Benjamin. Stir \w up|strong="H7462"\w* \w your|strong="H7462"\w* mighty \w power|strong="H3478"\w*, \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w our|strong="H3478"\w* help.

God, restore \w us|strong="H6440"\w*: show \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* light \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H5782"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3444"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* saved.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* hosts, how \w long|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w anger|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* smoke, despite \w the|strong="H6440"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* people?

\w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* fed \w them|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* bread \w of|strong="H3068"\w* tears, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w* drink tears \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* measure.

\w The|strong="H8248"\w* scorn \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w our|strong="H8248"\w* neighbors \w you|strong="H8248"\w* \w make|strong="H8248"\w* \w us|strong="H8248"\w*, \w the|strong="H8248"\w* laughing-stock \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w our|strong="H8248"\w* foes.

God \w of|strong="H7760"\w* hosts, restore \w us|strong="H7760"\w*: \w show|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w light|strong="H7760"\w* \w of|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* face, \w so|strong="H7760"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* may \w be|strong="H7760"\w* saved.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* vine \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Egypt \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w*; \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w did|strong="H6635"\w* drive \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* plant \w her|strong="H7725"\w*;
\w in|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H1644"\w* ground \w you|strong="H1471"\w* \w did|strong="H1612"\w* clear she struck root, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* she filled all \w the|strong="H1644"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* shade \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w covered|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains, \w her|strong="H4390"\w* branches \w the|strong="H6440"\w* cedars \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God.

She sent forth \w her|strong="H3680"\w* shoots \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* sea, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w her|strong="H3680"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w* \w as|strong="H2022"\w* far \w as|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* River.

Why \w have|strong="H5104"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* torn \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* fences, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w left|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* plucked \w at|strong="H3220"\w* \w by|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* who pass \w by|strong="H5704"\w*,

\w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* gnawed \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* boar \w from|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forest, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* devoured \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* field?

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H7704"\w* hosts, return: look down \w from|strong="H7704"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H7704"\w* see \w and|strong="H7704"\w* visit this vine, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* restore her
\w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w right|strong="H5027"\w* hand \w has|strong="H6635"\w* planted.

\w She|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* burned \w with|strong="H5921"\w* fire \w and|strong="H1121"\w* cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* stern face \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* perishing.
Support \w the|strong="H6440"\w* one \w you|strong="H6440"\w* have chosen, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* one \w you|strong="H6440"\w* have raised \w for|strong="H6440"\w* yourself;

\w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* never draw back. Preserve \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* call \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* name.

\nd Lord\nd*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* hosts, restore \w us|strong="H2421"\w*: Show \w us|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* light \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* face, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w saved|strong="H2421"\w*.
